ModMetaData.name: Immortality
ModMetaData.author: Grumpy
ModMetaData.description:
Load Order - Core - HugsLib - Immortality
Original Title and Author: https://github.com/hamu-taro/Rimworld-EternalYouthTraits Eternal Youth Traits hamu-taro
This mod adds new traits: - "Eternal Youth" : Unable to die of age. - "Incomplete Immortal" : Unable to die from wounds. - "Immortal" : Cannot die from age or wounds.
